snippet: With only months to go in his last presidential term, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has surprised many of his critics by challenging a coalition of traditionalists.
abstract: Iran's Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, with only three months left in his last presidential term, is surprising many critics by challenging coalition of traditionalists; has raised series of controversies seemingly intended to reshape his public image and secure support of dissatisfied urban Iranians for his handpicked successor Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei.
lead_paragraph: With only months to go in his last presidential term, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has surprised many of his critics by challenging a coalition of traditionalists.

headline.seo: Ahmadinejad of Iran Reshapes Image Ahead of June Vote
headline.main: Power Struggle Is Gripping Iran Ahead of June Election
headline.print_headline: Power Struggle Gripping Iran Ahead of Vote
